P30STIN.A.description: Fear of job loss to automation
P30STIN.A.question: Do you agree or disagree that robots will take your job within the next ten years?

P30INN.B.question: Do you agree or disagree that it is possible to care for the environment and also have economic growth?

P30INN.C.description: Willingness to pay more for environmentally friendly products
P30INN.C.question: Do you agree or disagree that you are willing to pay 20% more for a product if it is environmentally friendly?

P30INN.D.description: Perception of gender inequality in business
P30INN.D.question: Do you agree or disagree that men have a considerable advantage over women when starting a business?

P30INN.E.description: Preference for products produced by women
P30INN.E.question: Do you agree or disagree that you prefer to buy products made by women over those made by men?

P30INN.F.description: Importance of technical skills for employment
P30INN.F.question: Do you agree or disagree that learning mathematics, engineering, or programming is important for getting a good job?

P36ST.description: Priority between climate action and economic growth
P36ST.question: Which of the following comes closer to your view about national priorities?

values.1: Priority should be given to fighting climate change, even if it affects economic growth
values.2: Priority should be given to economic growth, even if it affects the fight against climate change

P54ST.B.description: Belief in the market economy as the path to development
P54ST.B.question: Do you agree or disagree that a market economy is the only way your country can achieve development?
